name: Microsoft Ads (Bing) Search Campaign
description: Launch a Microsoft Advertising (Bing) search campaign with AI-generated keywords and RSA copy. Typically 30-50% lower CPCs than Google.

fields.name: targetAudience
fields.label: Target Audience
fields.placeholder: Describe your ideal customer (demographics, interests, pain points)
fields.help: Bing skews towards desktop users, older demographics (35-65), and B2B professionals

fields.name: budget
fields.label: Daily Budget ($)
fields.help: Budget per day in USD. Start 30-50% lower than Google due to lower CPCs on Bing

fields.name: landingUrl
fields.label: Landing Page URL
fields.help: Optimize for desktop (Bing is 60-70% desktop traffic)

fields.name: keywordCount
fields.label: Number of Keywords
fields.help: How many AI-generated keywords to create. Consider phrase/exact match for Bing.

fields.name: adVariants
fields.label: Ad Copy Variants (RSA)
fields.help: Number of Responsive Search Ad variations to test

fields.name: importFromGoogle
fields.label: Import from Google Ads?
fields.help: If you have a Google Ads campaign, check this to import and adapt keywords/ads

fields.name: linkedInTargeting
fields.label: Enable LinkedIn Profile Targeting (B2B)
fields.help: Target by company, job title, industry (requires B2B audience)

presets.name: B2B Small Budget
presets.description: Ideal for testing Bing for B2B/enterprise products

presets.name: E-commerce Medium Budget
presets.description: Complement Google with Bing for e-commerce

presets.name: Enterprise Large Budget
presets.description: Full Bing expansion for high-ticket B2B
